```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
homicide_df = read_csv("./data/homicide-data.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(city_state = str_c(city, ",", state))
```

```{r}
total_homicid = 
  homicide_df %>% 
  group_by(city) %>% 
  summarise(total_count = n())

unsolved_homicide = 
  homicide_df %>% 
  filter(disposition %in% c("Closed without arrest", "Open/No arrest")) %>% 
  group_by(city) %>% 
  summarise(unsolved_count = n())

left_join(total_homicid, unsolved_homicide)
```

```{r}
Baltimore_homicide = 
  homicide_df %>% 
  filter(city_state == "Baltimore,MD") %>% 
  mutate(whether_solved = case_when(
    disposition == "Closed without arrest" ~ "unsolved",
    disposition == "Open/No arrest" ~ "unsolved",
    disposition == "Closed by arrest" ~ "solved"
  )) %>% 
  group_by(whether_solved) %>% 
  summarise(count = n())
```


```{r}
proportions_test = prop.test(1825, 2827)
proportions_test = 
  proportions_test %>% 
  broom::tidy()
estimated_proportion = proportions_test %>% 
  pull(estimate)
lower_CI_proportion = proportions_test %>% 
  pull(conf.low)
upper_CI_proportion = proportions_test %>% 
  pull(conf.high)
```

The estimated proportion is `r estimated_proportion`, and the 95% confidence interval for proportion is [`r lower_CI_proportion`, `r upper_CI_proportion`]
